about_the_game:
Every User who brought the DLC "GOD OF WAR EDITION" receives the following package:
  • 4 Special Weapon Skins
  • 1 Special Character Set
  • a Special "Mercenary" Forum Badge
  • Golden Ingame Chat Color
  • Ingame Icon in Playerlist
detailed_description:
Every User who brought the DLC "GOD OF WAR EDITION" receives the following package:
  • 4 Special Weapon Skins
  • 1 Special Character Set
  • a Special "Mercenary" Forum Badge
  • Golden Ingame Chat Color
  • Ingame Icon in Playerlist
name: Shadow Unit - GOD OF WAR EDITION

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Windows 7
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce GTX 465 / ATI Radeon TM HD 6870
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9 Compatible Card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD® FX 8150 3.6 GHz or Intel® Core™ i7 2600 3.4 GHz or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 950, ATI Radeon™ R7 360 or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9 Compatible Card

short_description: Ever wanted to be a GOD OF WAR? Let your dreams come true in Shadow Unit.
supported_languages:
English*, German
*languages with full audio support
